messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Rebuilding the economy and protecting the planet are both necessary. To do this we need informed and committed politicians. Paul wants to call time on ID cards, Iraq and Trident.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure only 'green' new housing and help with environmental improvements for all.
Support electoral reform – where every vote counts.

Supports The Queen Victoria and Princess Royal Hospitals, Youth Creativity Tree, the Bluebell Railway and The Youth Hostel Association. Helping local communities and, with partner Heather, is actively making their home energy efficient and their lives more sustainable.

issues.economy: Rebuilding the economy and protecting the planet are both necessary.
issues.governance: Support electoral reform – where every vote counts.

housing.content: Ensure only 'green' new housing and help with environmental improvements for all.

quotes.text: Vote Green to get a fairer deal for the people of Mid Sussex

images.caption: Paul Brown campaigning for a Green New Deal with leader of the Green Party, Dr Caroline Lucas.
Vote Paul Brown to be your Green Party MP for Mid Sussex

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on 100% recycled paper using sustainable technologies that do not harm the environment.
